feature.label: Python4Capella Ecore API generator
feature.description:
This feature is not intended to be installed inside of Capella nor Capella Studio.
This feature can be installed in an other Eclipse where you can import your *.ecore files.
This feature allows you to generate new Python APIs to use with Python for Capella form any *.ecore files. This can be used to generate the API for an addon you are using or developing.
Documentation: https://github.com/labs4capella/python4capella/blob/master/doc/org.eclipse.python4capella.doc/doc/user/general/Write.textile#generate-python-for-capella-apis-for-your-capella-addon
